title: GRDC Update: Pulses a ‘slow burn’ as WA seeks wider rotation
summary: Despite their volatile markets and agronomic and harvesting challenges, pulses are piquing interest among WA growers, as evidenced in two GRDC Perth Update sessions this week.

title: Wilga Farming expands Great Southern footprint
summary: Investor Wilga Farming has expanded its holdings in WA's Great Southern region to take in Que Sera and part of the WALT Portfolio.

title: Large CQ area set to underpin national mungbean crop
summary: Recent rain means CQ is on track to produce much of Australia's mungbean crop, and growers are advised to take extra care not to exceed MRLs.

title: District farmers buy Boorala, Wilgaroi, Kookaburragong
summary: Family farmers are showing an appetite for local expansion, as evidenced by the sales of Boorala in SA, and Wilgaroi and Kookaburragong in NSW.

title: GrainCorp confident of global market rebalance
summary: GrainCorp executives say they expect a more balanced global market to emerge, as the company continues to contend with grain oversupply and sustained price pressures.

title: Feedgrain Focus: Qld rain brightens new-crop prospects
summary: Substantial rain over parts of the Qld grainbelt has been welcomed, falling at the ideal time for recently planted sorghum in CQ, and topping up subsoil ahead of winter-crop planting.

title: Daily Market Wire 20 February 2026
summary: Wheat rallies 2 percent amid technical breakout; sentiment dominates price action.

title: GRDC Update: Satellites reveal crunch times for frost
summary: A CSIRO project is using Himawari satellite imagery coupled with APSIM modelling to predict in-crop wheat, barley, canola, chickpea and lentil yield losses to frost.

title: Ag Minister rejects GPA levy proposal
summary: Agriculture Minister Collins has knocked back changes to the levy system proposed by GPA, pointing to a lack of widespread support across the sector.

title: Spraying to control bacteria shows promise in curbing frost hits
summary: WA DPIRD research shows frost impact can be mitigated by spraying oxide-based formulations on ice-nucleating bacteria found on senesced wheat and barley leaves.

title: Resurrect Bio raises $8.1m to unlock plants’ innate disease resistance capabilities
summary:
Resurrect Bio helps plants unlock innate capabilities to fight disease without chemical inputs.
